name: UI Interactions & Animation by ORWHAT
description:
Cherry on Top

Figma is a solid tool, it even allows you to add interactivity to your protoypes and animate transitions between artboards using smart animate.


This draft is a sample file and walkthrough on how you can make use of these handy features through examples like Hover, Click and After Delay interactivity.


Say hi & see more at:

www.orwhat.cc
